article.description: Sam Hunt scored 25 points to lead North Carolina A&T to a 61-47 victory over Grambling State on Thursday night.
article.headline: Hunt with 25 points, North Carolina A&T beats Grambling St.
article.linkText: Hunt with 25 points, North Carolina A&T beats Grambling St.
article.story: GREENSBORO, N.C. -- Sam Hunt scored 25 points to lead North Carolina A&T to a 61-47 victory over Grambling State on Thursday night. Hunt was 7 of 14 from the floor with four 3-pointers. Joshea Singleton added 14 points for North Carolina A&T (5-8), which bounced back from the 71-60 loss at East Carolina that snapped a four-game win streak. Bruce Beckford chipped in six points with 11 rebounds and Ahmad Abdullah had a game-high five assists for the Aggies. Remond Brown scored 16 points and grabbed 10 rebounds with four steals to lead Grambling State (2-8). The Tigers lost three consecutive games and scored less than 52 points during the skid. Michael Bethea Jr. added 10 points. It was tied 21-all at halftime. The Aggies outscored Grambling State 40-26 in the second half.

statistics.description: The number of points scored.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.name: minutes
statistics.description: The total number of minutes played.

statistics.name: assistTurnoverRatio
statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover

statistics.description: The total number of rebounds (offensive and defensive).

statistics.description: The number of times when the defense obtains the possession of the ball after a missed shot by the offense.
